Class BookList

  • java.lang.Object
    • BookList

  • public class BookList
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to hold details of book files. This version can play the files.
    Version:
    (Assignment 2017.11.20)
    Author:
    (LO,KE-HSIN)

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String title)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Remave a book from the list by matching the title of the book If there is mare than one book, then the error will occur
        Parameters:
        title - The title of the book to be removed
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when one of two condition happen:not found or multiple found of the same title of the book
        java.lang.Exception

      • search

        public Books search(java.lang.String keyword)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Searching the books from the book files By matching the keyword with title,author,publisher or publication date
        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword to search the book
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the keyword is null or empty
        java.lang.Exception

      • size

        Return the number of files in the collection.

        The number of files in the collection.
